DOC.brief_title: Atropine Versus Atropine Neonatal Rapid Sequence Intubation
DOC.detailed_description: We hypothesize premedication intubation fentanyl succinylcholine alone maintain equal stability heart rate oxygen saturation without prolongation time completion intubation compare protocol use atropine , fentanyl succinylcholine . In order answer question plan undertake prospective randomize double blind control trial use atropine adjunct elective intubation infant less 46 week postmenstrual age .
